product_name: CliniqueGlow from AM to PM Moisture Surge Skincare Gift Set
summary: SummaryClinique Glow From AM To PM Hydrating Skincare Gift Set is a trio of hydration heroes to keep you glowing from sunrise to sunset.
details: DetailsBenefitsA skincare routine for a daily glow.Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator Moisturizer fights back against life's daily dehydrations. The lightweight gel-cream sinks into skin for deep, lasting hydration, for skin that feels more resilient and looks glowing.Moisture Surge SPF 28 Sheer Hydrator Moisturizer is a cloud-like face moisturizer with SPF. It hydrates and delivers sheer sun protection - even for deep skin tones.Formulated with powerful actives, Moisture Surge™ Active Glow Serum with hyaluronic acid exfoliates, hydrates, and brightens to give skin an instant and continuous glow.Free of: parabens and phthalates.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.IncludesFull Size Moisture Surge 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator Moisturizer (1.7 oz)Full Size Moisture Surge Broad Spectrum SPF 28 Sheer Hydrator Moisturizer (1.0 oz)Moisture Surge Active Glow Serum (0.17 oz)BagItem 2641059How To UseUse Moisture Surge Active Glow Serum morning and night on clean skin. Start with 3 drops, adding more if preferred. Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using and the week after.Use Moisture Surge 100H Hydrator Moisturizer morning and night on clean skin.Use Moisture Surge SPF 28 Sheer Hydrator Moisturizer in the morning for hydration + sun protection. It looks opaque going on, so you can see where you apply it. Start in the center, applying at the highest points, where the sun hits first.Pat or massage outward, covering your entire face. Pat or massage in until fully sheer.IngredientsSee packaging for full listing.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use Moisture Surge Active Glow Serum morning and night on clean skin. Start with 3 drops, adding more if preferred. Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using and the week after.Use Moisture Surge 100H Hydrator Moisturizer morning and night on clean skin.Use Moisture Surge SPF 28 Sheer Hydrator Moisturizer in the morning for hydration + sun protection. It looks opaque going on, so you can see where you apply it. Start in the center, applying at the highest points, where the sun hits first.Pat or massage outward, covering your entire face. Pat or massage in until fully sheer.
